Literature.Title: Hybrid Antimicrobial Peptide Targeting Staphylococcus aureu s and Displaying Anti-infective Activity in a Murine Model.
Literature.Author: Shang L, Li J, Song C, Zaytseva N, Li Q, Chou S, Wang Z, Shan A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>64µM),Escherichia coli K88(MIC=>64µM),Escherichia coli K99(MIC=>64µM),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=>64µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=>64µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium C77-31(MIC=>64µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Pullorum C79-13(MIC=>64µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>64µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>64µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>64µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=>64µM),Lactiplantibacillus plantarum 8014(MIC=>64µM),Lacticaseibacillus rhamnosus 7469(MIC=>64µM),Lacticaseibacillus rhamnosus 1.0911(MIC=>64µM),Lacticaseibacillus rhamnosus 1.0936(MIC=>64µM),Lacticaseibacillus rhamnosus 1.0385(MIC=>64µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(20-30% Killing=128µM)
